about_the_game:
Stunning Sky Environment


Immerse yourself in a vibrant and captivating sky world that keeps you engaged and motivated throughout your language-learning adventure. Dynamic visuals and atmospheric effects ensure your learning experience is anything but dull.

Kanji Pathways


The path ahead isn't always clear – unlock your way forward by deciphering Kanji characters displayed on each platform. Match the character's meaning or reading to progress, and watch as the sky bridges form before your eyes.

Kanji Cards


Discover Kanji cards that provide essential information about each character. These cards offer insights into stroke order, meanings, and example common words using the Kanji, enhancing your learning experience while you play.

Hiragana and Katakana Mastery


Hone your skills in the foundational scripts of hiragana and katakana. Master these essential Japanese scripts as part of your main journey, ensuring a strong linguistic foundation.

Collection Showcase


Track your progress and showcase your linguistic achievements in a dedicated collection. Review all the characters you've learned so far, reinforcing your knowledge and inspiring your journey.

Hiragana and Katakana Mastery

name: Kappa Kanji Adventure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 / AMD Radeon HD 5570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - i7 Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 750Ti / AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: "Kappa Kanji Adventure" is an innovative and educational platformer game that combines the excitement of fast-paced jumping challenges with the intricate art of learning Kanji characters. Player embark on a thrilling adventure where their linguistic and platforming skills are put to the test.
